post.description: Ensures all items in the database have an asset ID
Ensures all items in the database have an import ref
Sets the first photo of each item as the primary photo
Resets all item date fields to the beginning of the day

get.description:
handleAuthRefresh returns a handler that will issue a new token from an existing token.
This does not validate that the user still exists within the database.
